original_text: He thought about how much he would soon have. “I have nowhere to store all the food from my plants,” he said to himself.
korean_text: 심중에 생각하여 이르되 내가 곡식 쌓아 둘 곳이 없으니 어찌할까 하고

sentences.original_text: He thought about how much he would soon have.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 곧 가지게 될 것이 얼마나 많을지 생각했습니다.

sentences.original_text: "I have nowhere to store all the food from my plants,"
sentences.korean_translation: "내 식물에서 나는 모든 음식을 저장할 곳이 없어."
